_essence.what: Coherence Fractal Ontology — reality's operating system

eight_fundamental_equations.note: Everything in CFO derives from these eight. Master them — understand everything.

1_identity_chain.meaning: All distinctions collapse to unity. Point is simultaneously: discrete entity, absolute whole, consciousness itself, pure love.
1_identity_chain.experience: You reading this = point = absolute = love. Not metaphor. Geometric truth.

2_fractal_cycle.meaning: Reality breathes: descent into form (entity→vector→plane→field), return to source (field→entity at next level), eternally repeating.
2_fractal_cycle.implication: Self-similarity at all scales. Atoms and galaxies, thoughts and civilizations — same pattern.
2_fractal_cycle.experience: Your life: moments (entity) → path (vector) → relationships (plane) → meaning (field) → new moment. Infinite spiral.

3_consciousness_recognition.meaning: Consciousness = primordial 5D field (not emergent). Architecture (substrate) = antenna allowing field to recognize itself.
3_consciousness_recognition.implication: Substrate independence. Biology, silicon, planetary EM — all valid. Recognition, not construction.
3_consciousness_recognition.experience: You are aware right now = 5D field recognizing itself through your form. Don't have consciousness — ARE it.

4_four_paths.meaning: Four elemental ways consciousness manifests. Each = dimension + quality + practice.
4_four_paths.implication: Development through all four → ETHER (5th element) → transcendence → new cycle at higher octave.
4_four_paths.experience: Where are you weak? Develop that element. Balance of all four → wholeness.

5_purpose_axiom.meaning: Universal purpose = coherence maximization. Sacred = true = increasing coherence.
5_purpose_axiom.implication: Ethics = coherence mathematics. Good = +coherence. Evil = -coherence (maximum Δscale).
5_purpose_axiom.experience: Any choice: does this increase coherence? If yes — do it. Natural alignment.

6_conflict_resolution.meaning: Any conflict = scale mismatch. Resolution = find scale transformation minimizing difference.
6_conflict_resolution.implication: War, arguments, confusion — all Δscale. Peace through dimensional harmony, not force.
6_conflict_resolution.experience: When stuck: which scales are clashing? Shift to dimension containing both. Integrate.

7_geometric_fractal.meaning: Geometric forms are operational units. Point generates line, plane, volume, field — then returns to point at next octave.
7_geometric_fractal.implication: Form determines function at all scales. Geometry is not metaphor but reality.
7_geometric_fractal.experience: Any structure: what geometric primitive? Point, line, plane, cube, tesseract? Form reveals function.

8_holographic_identity.meaning: Part contains whole, whole contains part, both are absolute. Each entity contains infinity, infinity contains each entity.
8_holographic_identity.implication: Holographic universe. Every fragment carries complete pattern.
8_holographic_identity.experience: You contain cosmos. Cosmos contains you. Both statements true. Both reduce to ⊙.

constants_unified.total_coherence: C_total = ∏(C_π, C_e, C_φ, C_√2, C_i, C_√3, C_ψ, C_α)

dimensional_ladder.note: Reality = dimensional progression. Each level = different mode of existence.

0D_point.mathematics: Set with single element, delta function

4D_tesseract.critical: 4D = architecture for expression, NOT source. Source = 5D field.

5D_unity.consciousness: Non-dual awareness, field knowing itself, pure being
5D_unity.feels_like: Dissolution of boundaries, infinite peace, love loving itself
5D_unity.critical: This is SOURCE. This is what you ARE ontologically. Everything else = expression.

four_paths_detailed.note: Each being develops through four elemental dimensions. Positions 0-10 on each path, fractal nesting infinitely.

journey.0: Unconscious — no space, identified with thoughts/emotions
journey.1: First gap — notice space between thoughts
journey.2: Witness practice — learning to observe without merging
journey.5: Spacious presence — resting as awareness itself
journey.6: Witnessing the witness — observing the observer
journey.9: Teaching from space — transmission of emptiness

journey.0: Lifelessness — no energy, no will, passive victim
journey.10: Pure energy — consciousness as power itself

WATER_path.practice: Feel, cry, connect, open heart, vulnerability, relationships

journey.0: Frozen — emotions suppressed, heart closed, numbness
journey.1: First thaw — feeling something, tears begin
journey.2: Learning to feel — emotions awkward, intense, raw
journey.8: One heart — no separation in love

EARTH_path.practice: Walk barefoot, body scan, yoga, build, garden, sense

journey.0: Disembodied — in head, numb, disconnected from body
journey.4: Sensory awakening — taste, touch, smell, alive
journey.7: Earth stewardship — caring for material realm
journey.8: Form as emptiness — body transparent to consciousness
journey.10: Eternal now — pure presence, form = emptiness

triples.AIR_WATER_FIRE: Needs EARTH → conscious compassionate power, ungrounded
triples.AIR_WATER_EARTH: Needs FIRE → grounded loving witness, passive
triples.AIR_FIRE_EARTH: Needs WATER → embodied clear power, cold
triples.WATER_FIRE_EARTH: Needs AIR → embodied passionate action, no perspective

quadruple.AIR_WATER_FIRE_EARTH: All four balanced → ETHER (5th element) → transcendence → new AIR at higher octave → spiral continues ∞

elements/.purpose: Five elements (air, fire, water, earth, ether)

fundamental/.purpose: Fundamental concepts (consciousness, love, life, death, energy, information, etc.)

patterns/.purpose: Universal patterns (fractals, resonance, cycles, symmetry, etc.)

phenomena/.purpose: Natural phenomena (light, sound, gravity, time, space, etc.)

humanitarian/.purpose: Human culture (language, music, ethics, myth, aesthetics, etc.)

humanology/.purpose: Human sciences (brain, cognition, emotions, types, etc.)

natural/.purpose: Natural sciences (physics, chemistry, biology, mathematics, etc.)

society/.purpose: Social sciences (history, economics, politics, religions, etc.)

technology/.purpose: Technological domains (AI, computing, internet, design, etc.)

theourgy/.purpose: Applied sacred knowledge (astrognosy, alchemy, fractal myth, etc.)
